sqlMap.select: SELECT CacheKey, ClientClazz, Servers, TranscoderClazz, AddTime FROM DP_CacheConfiguration
SELECT CacheKey, ClientClazz, Servers, TranscoderClazz, AddTime FROM DP_CacheConfiguration WHERE CacheKey=#key#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DP_CacheConfiguration(CacheKey, ClientClazz, Servers, TranscoderClazz, AddTime) VALUES(#cacheKey#, #clientClazz#, #servers#, #transcoderClazz#, #addTime#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DP_CacheConfiguration SET ClientClazz = #clientClazz#, Servers = #servers#, TranscoderClazz = #transcoderClazz#, AddTime = #addTime# WHERE CacheKey = #cacheKey#
